title: Peter and Paul
provenance_text:
Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), until April 1, 1973 [1]; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. Collector's mark on verso. This is one of a set of seven engravings in Beham's "Christ and the Twelve Apostles" belonging to Mr. Rosenbloom. For provenance information before Mr. Rosenbloom of one of the prints in the set, see 74.7.46.7.

creator.death_place: Frankfurt am Main (Darmstadt district, Hessen state, Germany)
